title: 如何使用手环检测单次运动？
answer:
点亮手环屏幕，滑动至单次运动界面 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150908084719495001.png)，长按![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150908084719508002.png) 直到倒计时结束，手环将会检测您单次的运动数据。

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150908084720394003.png)：停止计时

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150908084719508002.png)：继续计时

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150908084720742004.png)：查看此次运动时长、运动数据及消耗的卡路里
